Package geometries

Class Cylinder

java.lang.Object
geometries.Cylinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Geometry, Intersectible
public class Cylinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Geometry
This class represents a cylinder, which is a three-dimensional tube with a height, and closed disks on either end.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Cylinder​(Ray ray, double radius, double height)
    This constructs a Cylinder.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    NormalizedVector direction()
    Gets the axis NormalizedVector of the Cylinder.
    java.util.List<Point> intersect​(Ray ray)
    This function will find intersection points (possibly none) between a Ray and an Cylinder.
    NormalizedVector normal​(Point p)
    This function returns the normal vector relative to the Point p.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Cylinder

      public Cylinder​(Ray ray, double radius, double height)
      This constructs a Cylinder.
      Parameters:
      ray - The ray that makes up the center of the Cylinder.
      radius - A positive double that represents the radius.
      height - A positive double that represents the height of the Cylinder.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the radius is zero or the height is not positive.

  • Method Details

    • direction

      public NormalizedVector direction()
      Gets the axis NormalizedVector of the Cylinder.
      Returns:
      The axis NormalizedVector of the Cylinder.

    • normal

      public NormalizedVector normal​(Point p)
      This function returns the normal vector relative to the Point p. p is assumed to be on the surface of the Cylinder. Anything else is undefined behavior.
      Specified by:
      normal in interface Geometry
      Parameters:
      p - The point at which to find the normal vector.
      Returns:
      A NormalizedVector perpendicular to the surface of the shape at the given Point.

    • intersect

      public java.util.List<Point> intersect​(Ray ray)
      This function will find intersection points (possibly none) between a Ray and an Cylinder.
      Specified by:
      intersect in interface Intersectible
      Parameters:
      ray - The Ray to intersect
      Returns:
      a list (possibly empty) of intersection points
